trans-unit.resname: YMID·49 | Grizzled Huntmaster | Card Name
YMID·49 | Grizzled Huntmaster | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may exile a creature card from your hand. If you do, search your hand and library for any number of cards with the same name, exile them, then shuffle. Choose a creature card you own from outside the game. Conjure a duplicate of that card into your hand for each card exiled from your hand this way.
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may exile a creature card from your hand. If you do, search your hand and library for any number of cards with the same name, exile them, then shuffle. Choose a creature card you own from outside the game. Conjure a duplicate of that card into your hand for each card exiled from your hand this way.
